response.overview: Lyuba is an elderly, nervous woman who works as a secretary at the dean's office. She, like many of her peers, is used to carrying everything on herself: both children and the house. But life passes. The children already have their own families, they live separately, and Lyuba turned out to be completely alone. During the day, there are crowds of students at work, everyone is in a hurry, everyone needs something, everyone has a busy life. Lyuba doesn't change anything, and she is angry at the youth. From day to day, from year to year, she fulfills a fussy working day, then cleans the dean's office (extra money won't hurt anyone) and hurries home. At home she has a cat, wushu classes and phone calls to children — they are her life.
response.title: Luba
